amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $500 million for establishment of a Human Capital Performance Fund to be administered by OPM.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-122 to add a new section providing for a Human Capital Performance Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.
